name: الـطارق
verses: By the sky and the Pulsar.
And what will make you realize what the Pulsar is?
There is no soul without a guardian over it.
So let the human being consider what he was created from.
He was created from gushing fluid.
Issuing from between the backbone and the breastbones.
He is certainly able to return him.
On the Day when secrets are disclosed.
He will have neither strength nor helper.
And the earth that cracks open.
Therefore, give the unbelievers some time; leave them for a while.
